titleStmt.title: A vindication of the divine authority and inspiration of the writings of the Old and New Testament in answer to a treatise lately translated out of French, entituled, Five letters concerning the inspiration of the Holy Scriptures / by William Lowth ...
titleStmt.author: Lowth, William, 1660-1732.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the Theater, and are to be sold by John Wilmot ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
